name: Affinity
natural_language_description: 这是 Affinity 节点。主要用于: Consume Affinity API

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: organization

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: create
available_options: Get Many (值: getAll) - Get many persons

listId.name: listId
listId.description: The unique ID of the list that contains the specified list_entry_id. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
listId.natural_language_description: 参数名: List Name or ID | 作用: The unique ID of the list that contains the specified list_entry_id. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 5

entityId.name: entityId
entityId.description: The unique ID of the entity (person, organization, or opportunity) to add to this list
entityId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Entity ID | 作用: The unique ID of the entity (person, organization, or opportunity) to add to this list | (必填项)

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: organizations (值: None) - Organizations that the person is associated with. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.

listEntryId.name: listEntryId
listEntryId.description: The unique ID of the list entry object to be deleted
listEntryId.natural_language_description: 参数名: List Entry ID | 作用: The unique ID of the list entry object to be deleted | (必填项)

name.name: name
name.natural_language_description: 参数名: Name | 作用: The name of the organization | (必填项)

domain.name: domain
domain.description: The domain name of the organization
domain.natural_language_description: 参数名: Domain | 作用: The domain name of the organization | (必填项)

organizationId.name: organizationId
organizationId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Organization ID | 作用: Unique identifier for the organization | (必填项)

updateFields.name: updateFields
updateFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Update Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: firstName (值: None) - The first name of the person
lastName (值: None) - The last name of the person
organizations (值: None) - Organizations that the person is associated with. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: term (值: None) - A string used to search all the persons in your team’s address book. This could be an email address, a first name or a last name.
withInteractionDates (值: None) - Whether interaction dates will be present on the returned resources

firstName.name: firstName
firstName.description: The first name of the person
firstName.natural_language_description: 参数名: First Name | 作用: The first name of the person | (必填项)

lastName.name: lastName
lastName.description: The last name of the person
lastName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Last Name | 作用: The last name of the person | (必填项)

emails.name: emails
emails.description: The email addresses of the person
emails.natural_language_description: 参数名: Emails | 作用: The email addresses of the person | 默认值: []

personId.name: personId
personId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Person ID | 作用: Unique identifier for the person | (必填项)
